title: Drawing, "Desing for a Monogram: Z. B.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and brush and black ink on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: Z. B.; at upper right corner: 1082.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Monogram designed in negative space within a black square, white "Z" with cross bar continuing into a "B" formed by two white semi-circles.
On verso, a Canson and Montgolfier label.
Puiforcat fabrication #:
